text: Artur Kozłowski (born 19 January 1985) is a long-distance runner from Poland. He finished 39th in the marathon at the 2016 Olympics. Kozłowski took up athletics around the age of 16. He has a degree in information technology from the University of Łódź. He is married to Paulina. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male long-distance runners Category:Polish male middle-distance runners Category:Polish male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Poland Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sieradz
title: Artur Kozłowski (runner)
